description: This file defines an AI agent named 'Agno Assist' using the Agno framework. It imports various modules, sets up database connections, paths, and detailed instructions for the agent's behavior. It then creates an instance of the Agent class with specific configurations, including memory, knowledge base, tools, and other parameters.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with specific tools, memory, knowledge, and behavior settings.

methods.name: Agent
methods.description: Constructor for creating an agent with specified parameters such as name, model, memory, knowledge, tools, and behavior settings.
